ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:31:00 urn:comixology:765922 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:44:34. [Issue ID 1969263]
ComicInfo.Summary: Samuel reveals that Tituba is the name of the witch who killed Gretel's brother, but Gretel wonders how long he has been keeping this information from her. Meanwhile, Tituba forces Dae, an ally of Samuel's, to attack Gretel and Samuel, but the attack fails and Tituba kills her, taking on her form.
ComicInfo.Characters: Samuel,Vita Mortuum (flashback),Calabar (name unrevealed until issue #4),Tituba,Gretel,Dae Denuntio
ComicInfo.Writer: Ben Meares,Joe Brusha,Ralph Tedesco,Dave Franchini,Ben Meares,Joe Brusha,Ralph Tedesco,Dave Franchini
ComicInfo.Colorist: Ceci de la Cruz,Ceci de la Cruz
